posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Take one more Fighter to grab Epic Weapon Specialization, but WHY did you take Exotic Weapons if you didn't plan to focus on an exotic weapon? You could've taken a Bastard Sword to do infinitely more damage than a morning star. Regardless, you could use that Fighter level to raise Discipline and the last level can be Cleric, to grant you some extra spells / day.

Take it EZ!

Understood.

The thing is that with Cleric 21 you would have more spells, but also the ability to take an epic spell as your lvl 30 General Feat, which IMO is better than having an extra feat from Fighter 8. The fear aura of the summoned Mummy is EXCELLENT against meleers. But you can go either way. The problem isn't exactly the fact you have an extra feat or not, it is what you are going to take with it. If you have something worth your while to take, then go for Cleric 19 Ftr 8 Rogue 3, otherwise go Cleric 21 and grab an epic spell (Greater Ruin or Mummy Dust) at lvl 30.

Take it EZ!

Hell ball would be awsome, casted on my character, knockning enemies about down immedietly. But her DC on great ruin and hell ball is going to be very low (not planning high wisdom), from 27 up to 28.
Low DCs are what kill the epic spells. I would only take the Mummy, as the dragon summon is really weak. The mummy isn't exactly strong, but the thing is that the fear aura will do wonders for ya, especially in a 30 lvl cap world. If you're not going for the Mummy, then IMO take Fighter and get that extra feat, as none of the other spells you have access to are worth the trouble.

Take it EZ!
